abstract: This year is the 400th anniversary of the King James Bible's publication, and the TV network affiliated with Brigham Young University is broadcasting a three-part documentary series on that Bible's history.
snippet: This year is the 400th anniversary of the King James Bible's publication, and the TV network affiliated with Brigham Young University is broadcasting a three-part documentary series on that Bible's history.

headline.main: Channel Surfing: 'Fires of Faith' on BYUtv
